TextView.android:text:
This is the DIARY view and it shows information about each DISMISSED notification.
 
 For each DISMISSED notification, please specify (1=bad, 5=good) the importance of the information, and the situation in which the notification was presented.
 
 If you are unsure or can not remember, please select UNSURE.
 
 Click next to continue the tutorial or previous to return to previous page.
